subject: fix: add icon rewrites to vercel.json for proper PWA installation
body:
The catch-all rewrite was redirecting icon requests to the root HTML page,
preventing Chrome from validating the icons required for PWA installation.
This caused the app to install as a browser shortcut instead of a standalone PWA.

- Add explicit rewrites for icon.svg, icon-192.png, icon-512.png, apple-touch-icon.png
- Add manifest id field for better PWA identity

https://claude.ai/code/session_01N1eLhnSC2xo3XpfTdtxPvb
title: add icon rewrites to vercel.json for proper PWA installation
